fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per game, disintergrate up to two players to turn them into dust.
- Each day, open a chest to receive a random role card, use all abilities from the role on a random target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot self-target.
- Counts as Townie.
- Cannot die.
- Redirection immune immune.
- Made with the cooperation of Lunari, Rasen, bionic, Luka, Nitowl, Viri, Seon, and and Nub.
